response.name: SOS TUESDAYS: Street of Salsa With Delhi Salsa Club
response.description:
SoS Tuesday's. : street Of Salsa
Welcome you all to a very authentic & a pure
SALSA nite dedicated to all the Salsa lovers of Delhi and the ones travelling into.
Delhi Salsa Club
brings forth
SoS : Street of Salsa , Tuesday
@
The Junction
As the name suggests it'll be a night filled with Salsa Music from the oldest recorded Salsa scores to the latest one's, from the legends to the most danced songs it'll all be boxed into this one night, we will make you all travel to the core of Salsa Music which will not let you off the floor.
The place I bet you cannot not fall in love with The Junction in its first sight, the floor is silk, the ambiance will excite you, and the music will not let you stop...
for SoS nite , It'll be known as
The Salsa Junction
response.address: HuszKhas,The Junction, New Delhi, Delhi, India
